University Downtown Center Outbound

Description:

The University Downtown Center Outbound leaves campus enroute to the Downtown Center.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
7:00 A.M. to 6:15 P.M.


Weekends:
On Weekends the UDC Outbound does not run.

For service to Downtown Binghamton please take the Westside Outbound or the Downtown Center-Leroy St Outbound.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the University Downtown Center Outbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.

② Arrives at the University Downtown Center
